page.title: 15STEVE CRAM - FAMOUS ATHLETE
page.content: {Steve Cram}is a member of Jarrow and Hebburn Running Club held at{Monkton {Stadium.}In 1983,his greatest achievement was to win the 1500m at the World Championships in Helsinki. At 11,he wanted to be a footballer,but Jimmy Hedley,his coach,persuaded Steven to run.He soon won the Schoolboy Championship.He has won 100s of medals but 1983 was his best year,Gold at 1500m in Commonwealth Games,European Games and World Games.In 1984 he won Silver medal at the Los Angeles Olympics.Although he is famous all over the world Steve has kept his original trainer and is still a member of Monkton Running Club.In 1985 Steve Cram has broken{3 World {Records,the 1500 metres,time 3 {min.29.67sec,the mile,time 3 {min.46.31sec and the 200 metres,time 4 {min.51.39sec.
